div.p: GRG 19/391, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Undated fragment, but see M to N. Holtze, 9 September 1891.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.p: It would be good to get ripe fruits of this and C. cyanea for further comparisons

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.p: The fruit was unknown before; yours is not yet ripe enough for describing the seeds.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.p:
Verbenaceous
See also M to N. Holtze, 12 December 1891.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.p: Perhaps fruits could be obtained this season. How many Buchneras (including Strigas) can you specifically distinguish there in color of corolla &c &c

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.p:
Bauhinia
See M to N. Holtze, 18 December 1891

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.p: Seems new for Australia Will compare it with Indian species

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.p:
Eucalyptus Foelscheana, F.v.M.
Eucalyptus foelscheana (MEL 1611354), Holtze, near Darwin, n.d., no. 1257.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.361in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.361in;

cell.p: Seeing this without fruit before, and naming it when I was tired at candle light, I may have called Helicteres Isora.
